title: How does Wang Qiang react to his mother

content.prompt: How does Wang Qiang react to the women his mother introduces to him?

choices.label: He resists and evades them all.
He musters up the courage to speak with them.
They make his heart burst with joy.
They make him feel a bit embarrassed.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Determine the meaning of familiar and unfamiliar words.
